name: Icon Watches TV
description:
Warning: there's no longer any man twerking in this game :(

Icon is watching tv when he sees an sale he can't miss, he calls his buddy Omeger and they go on a highly nonsensical and parodic RPG adventure!

A message from the creator: I started this project as a silly inside joke (which this game has lots of) but it got way bigger than i expected, i hope you enjoy this DEMO!

CONTROLS:

Z to interact with objects

X to open the menu

Hold SHIFT to run

Hold CTRL to skip text boxes

Arrow keys to move

(These controls can be modified in-game)

This game is still in development and feedback would be welcome
